## hpr0135 :: LPI Ceritification Part 5 PCI Cards

 
 GNU Free Documentation License 
 elpicx Live-CD/DVD 
 Leading Edge Training Notes 
101-letter.pdf


Commands Used:

lspci -h|less
lspci -n|less
locate pci.ids | less
less 'locate pci.ids | head -1`
lspci | less
lspci -s 00:1d -v |less
less /proc/pci
echo "Read https://www.rt.com/man/pnpdump.8.html"
less /proc/interupts
less /proc/ioports
less /proc/iomem
less /proc/dma
